title: Stadionul Comunal (Valea Ursului)
text: Stadionul Comunal is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in the village of Valea Ursului, <a href="Bascov">Bascov</a> commune, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches. It is the home ground of <a href="CS%20Unirea%20Bascov">Unirea Bascov</a> and holds 2,000 people (400 seats).
